00023 struct btHashString
00024 {
00025         const char* m_string;
00026         unsigned int    m_hash;
00027 
00028         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       unsigned int getHash()const
00029         {
00030                 return m_hash;
00031         }
00032 
00033         btHashString(const char* name)
00034                 :m_string(name)
00035         {
00036                 /* magic numbers from http://www.isthe.com/chongo/tech/comp/fnv/ */
00037                 static const unsigned int  InitialFNV = 2166136261u;
00038                 static const unsigned int FNVMultiple = 16777619u;
00039 
00040                 /* Fowler / Noll / Vo (FNV) Hash */
00041                 unsigned int hash = InitialFNV;
00042                 
00043                 for(int i = 0; m_string[i]; i++)
00044                 {
00045                         hash = hash ^ (m_string[i]);       /* xor  the low 8 bits */
00046                         hash = hash * FNVMultiple;  /* multiply by the magic number */
00047                 }
00048                 m_hash = hash;
00049         }
00050 
00051         int portableStringCompare(const char* src,      const char* dst) const
00052         {
00053                         int ret = 0 ;
00054 
00055                         while( ! (ret = *(const unsigned char *)src - *(const unsigned char *)dst) && *dst)
00056                                         ++src, ++dst;
00057 
00058                         if ( ret < 0 )
00059                                         ret = -1 ;
00060                         else if ( ret > 0 )
00061                                         ret = 1 ;
00062 
00063                         return( ret );
00064         }
00065 
00066         bool equals(const btHashString& other) const
00067         {
00068                 return (m_string == other.m_string) ||
00069                         (0==portableStringCompare(m_string,other.m_string));
00070 
00071         }
00072 
00073 };
00074

00078 class btHashInt
00079 {
00080         int     m_uid;
00081 public:
00082 
00083         btHashInt()
00084         {
00085         }
00086 
00087         btHashInt(int uid)      :m_uid(uid)
00088         {
00089         }
00090 
00091         int     getUid1() const
00092         {
00093                 return m_uid;
00094         }
00095 
00096         void    setUid1(int uid)
00097         {
00098                 m_uid = uid;
00099         }
00100 
00101         bool equals(const btHashInt& other) const
00102         {
00103                 return getUid1() == other.getUid1();
00104         }
00105         //to our success
00106         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       unsigned int getHash()const
00107         {
00108                 unsigned int key = m_uid;
00109                 // Thomas Wang's hash
00110                 key += ~(key << 15);    key ^=  (key >> 10);    key +=  (key << 3);     key ^=  (key >> 6);     key += ~(key << 11);    key ^=  (key >> 16);
00111                 
00112                 return key;
00113         }
00114 };

00118 class btHashPtr
00119 {
00120 
00121         union
00122         {
00123                 const void*     m_pointer;
00124                 unsigned int    m_hashValues[2];
00125         };
00126 
00127 public:
00128 
00129         btHashPtr(const void* ptr)
00130                 :m_pointer(ptr)
00131         {
00132         }
00133 
00134         const void*     getPointer() const
00135         {
00136                 return m_pointer;
00137         }
00138 
00139         bool equals(const btHashPtr& other) const
00140         {
00141                 return getPointer() == other.getPointer();
00142         }
00143 
00144         //to our success
00145         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       unsigned int getHash()const
00146         {
00147                 const bool VOID_IS_8 = ((sizeof(void*)==8));
00148                 
00149                 unsigned int key = VOID_IS_8? m_hashValues[0]+m_hashValues[1] : m_hashValues[0];
00150                 // Thomas Wang's hash
00151                 key += ~(key << 15);    key ^=  (key >> 10);    key +=  (key << 3);     key ^=  (key >> 6);     key += ~(key << 11);    key ^=  (key >> 16);
00152                 return key;
00153         }
00154 
00155         
00156 };

00224 template <class Key, class Value>
00225 class btHashMap
00226 {
00227 
00228 protected:
00229         btAlignedObjectArray<int>               m_hashTable;
00230         btAlignedObjectArray<int>               m_next;
00231         
00232         btAlignedObjectArray<Value>             m_valueArray;
00233         btAlignedObjectArray<Key>               m_keyArray;
00234 
00235         void    growTables(const Key& /*key*/)
00236         {
00237                 int newCapacity = m_valueArray.capacity();
00238 
00239                 if (m_hashTable.size() < newCapacity)
00240                 {
00241                         //grow hashtable and next table
00242                         int curHashtableSize = m_hashTable.size();
00243 
00244                         m_hashTable.resize(newCapacity);
00245                         m_next.resize(newCapacity);
00246 
00247                         int i;
00248 
00249                         for (i= 0; i < newCapacity; ++i)
00250                         {
00251                                 m_hashTable[i] = BT_HASH_NULL;
00252                         }
00253                         for (i = 0; i < newCapacity; ++i)
00254                         {
00255                                 m_next[i] = BT_HASH_NULL;
00256                         }
00257 
00258                         for(i=0;i<curHashtableSize;i++)
00259                         {
00260                                 //const Value& value = m_valueArray[i];
00261                                 //const Key& key = m_keyArray[i];
00262 
00263                                 int     hashValue = m_keyArray[i].getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);      // New hash value with new mask
00264                                 m_next[i] = m_hashTable[hashValue];
00265                                 m_hashTable[hashValue] = i;
00266                         }
00267 
00268 
00269                 }
00270         }
00271 
00272         public:
00273 
00274         void insert(const Key& key, const Value& value) {
00275                 int hash = key.getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00276 
00277                 //replace value if the key is already there
00278                 int index = findIndex(key);
00279                 if (index != BT_HASH_NULL)
00280                 {
00281                         m_valueArray[index]=value;
00282                         return;
00283                 }
00284 
00285                 int count = m_valueArray.size();
00286                 int oldCapacity = m_valueArray.capacity();
00287                 m_valueArray.push_back(value);
00288                 m_keyArray.push_back(key);
00289 
00290                 int newCapacity = m_valueArray.capacity();
00291                 if (oldCapacity < newCapacity)
00292                 {
00293                         growTables(key);
00294                         //hash with new capacity
00295                         hash = key.getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00296                 }
00297                 m_next[count] = m_hashTable[hash];
00298                 m_hashTable[hash] = count;
00299         }
00300 
00301         void remove(const Key& key) {
00302 
00303                 int hash = key.getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00304 
00305                 int pairIndex = findIndex(key);
00306                 
00307                 if (pairIndex ==BT_HASH_NULL)
00308                 {
00309                         return;
00310                 }
00311 
00312                 // Remove the pair from the hash table.
00313                 int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00314                 btAssert(index != BT_HASH_NULL);
00315 
00316                 int previous = BT_HASH_NULL;
00317                 while (index != pairIndex)
00318                 {
00319                         previous = index;
00320                         index = m_next[index];
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 if (previous != BT_HASH_NULL)
00324                 {
00325                         btAssert(m_next[previous] == pairIndex);
00326                         m_next[previous] = m_next[pairIndex];
00327                 }
00328                 else
00329                 {
00330                         m_hashTable[hash] = m_next[pairIndex];
00331                 }
00332 
00333                 // We now move the last pair into spot of the
00334                 // pair being removed. We need to fix the hash
00335                 // table indices to support the move.
00336 
00337                 int lastPairIndex = m_valueArray.size() - 1;
00338 
00339                 // If the removed pair is the last pair, we are done.
00340                 if (lastPairIndex == pairIndex)
00341                 {
00342                         m_valueArray.pop_back();
00343                         m_keyArray.pop_back();
00344                         return;
00345                 }
00346 
00347                 // Remove the last pair from the hash table.
00348                 int lastHash = m_keyArray[lastPairIndex].getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00349 
00350                 index = m_hashTable[lastHash];
00351                 btAssert(index != BT_HASH_NULL);
00352 
00353                 previous = BT_HASH_NULL;
00354                 while (index != lastPairIndex)
00355                 {
00356                         previous = index;
00357                         index = m_next[index];
00358                 }
00359 
00360                 if (previous != BT_HASH_NULL)
00361                 {
00362                         btAssert(m_next[previous] == lastPairIndex);
00363                         m_next[previous] = m_next[lastPairIndex];
00364                 }
00365                 else
00366                 {
00367                         m_hashTable[lastHash] = m_next[lastPairIndex];
00368                 }
00369 
00370                 // Copy the last pair into the remove pair's spot.
00371                 m_valueArray[pairIndex] = m_valueArray[lastPairIndex];
00372                 m_keyArray[pairIndex] = m_keyArray[lastPairIndex];
00373 
00374                 // Insert the last pair into the hash table
00375                 m_next[pairIndex] = m_hashTable[lastHash];
00376                 m_hashTable[lastHash] = pairIndex;
00377 
00378                 m_valueArray.pop_back();
00379                 m_keyArray.pop_back();
00380 
00381         }
00382 
00383 
00384         int size() const
00385         {
00386                 return m_valueArray.size();
00387         }
00388 
00389         const Value* getAtIndex(int index) const
00390         {
00391                 btAssert(index < m_valueArray.size());
00392                 btAssert(index>=0);
00393                 if (index>=0 && index < m_valueArray.size())
00394                 {
00395                         return &m_valueArray[index];
00396                 }
00397                 return 0;
00398         }
00399 
00400         Value* getAtIndex(int index)
00401         {
00402                 btAssert(index < m_valueArray.size());
00403                 btAssert(index>=0);
00404                 if (index>=0 && index < m_valueArray.size())
00405                 {
00406                         return &m_valueArray[index];
00407                 }
00408                 return 0;
00409         }
00410 
00411     Key getKeyAtIndex(int index)
00412     {
00413         btAssert(index < m_keyArray.size());
00414                 btAssert(index>=0);
00415                 return m_keyArray[index];
00416     }
00417     
00418     const Key getKeyAtIndex(int index) const
00419     {
00420         btAssert(index < m_keyArray.size());
00421                 btAssert(index>=0);
00422                 return m_keyArray[index];
00423    }

00425 
00426         Value* operator[](const Key& key) {
00427                 return find(key);
00428         }
00429 
00430         const Value* operator[](const Key& key) const {
00431                 return find(key);
00432         }
00433 
00434         const Value*    find(const Key& key) const
00435         {
00436                 int index = findIndex(key);
00437                 if (index == BT_HASH_NULL)
00438                 {
00439                         return NULL;
00440                 }
00441                 return &m_valueArray[index];
00442         }
00443 
00444         Value*  find(const Key& key)
00445         {
00446                 int index = findIndex(key);
00447                 if (index == BT_HASH_NULL)
00448                 {
00449                         return NULL;
00450                 }
00451                 return &m_valueArray[index];
00452         }
00453 
00454 
00455         int     findIndex(const Key& key) const
00456         {
00457                 unsigned int hash = key.getHash() & (m_valueArray.capacity()-1);
00458 
00459                 if (hash >= (unsigned int)m_hashTable.size())
00460                 {
00461                         return BT_HASH_NULL;
00462                 }
00463 
00464                 int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00465                 while ((index != BT_HASH_NULL) && key.equals(m_keyArray[index]) == false)
00466                 {
00467                         index = m_next[index];
00468                 }
00469                 return index;
00470         }
00471 
00472         void    clear()
00473         {
00474                 m_hashTable.clear();
00475                 m_next.clear();
00476                 m_valueArray.clear();
00477                 m_keyArray.clear();
00478         }
00479 
00480 };
